PEACE HUMANITARIAN INITIATIVE TRUST

Our Purpose & Principles

"Peace is not a luxury—it's a necessity and humanity is not a choice—it's our shared identity."

Discover our vision for a better world, our mission to make it happen, the values that guide us, and how we align with global goals.

The World We Envision

"To foster a world where peace, dignity, human rights and social justice are upheld for all global citizens regardless of race, gender, nationality, or socioeconomic status."

How We Make It Happen

Peace and Humanitarian Initiative Trust (PHI) is dedicated to promoting sustainable peace, advancing human rights, and delivering life-saving humanitarian aid to vulnerable communities across the globe. We work to empower individuals and strengthen institutions through advocacy, education, and direct action.

See Our Mission in Action

The Values That Guide Us

In every decision we make and every action we take, we are guided by an unwavering commitment to our core principles.

Honesty - Operating with truthfulness and sincerity
Integrity - Adhering to the highest moral and ethical principles
Accountability - Taking responsibility for our actions and outcomes
Fairness - Ensuring impartial and just treatment for all
Justice - Upholding rights and ensuring equity
Transparency - Building trust through openness
Ubuntu - Recognizing our shared humanity and interconnectedness

Contributing to a Global Vision

Our work is strategically aligned with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), ensuring our local impact contributes to a broader global effort for a sustainable and equitable future.

1

No Poverty

End poverty in all its forms

2

Zero Hunger

End hunger, achieve food security

3

Good Health

Ensure healthy lives and well-being

4

Quality Education

Ensure inclusive and equitable education

5

Gender Equality

Achieve gender equality and empower all

6

Clean Water

Ensure availability of water and sanitation

13

Climate Action

Take urgent action on climate change

16

Peace & Justice

Promote peaceful and inclusive societies

Join Us in Our Mission

Together, we can build a more peaceful, just, and sustainable world. Partner with us to turn our shared vision into reality.
